/announce.Name: /announce
/announce.Content:
Broadcast a server-wide announcement.
Usage: /announce <message>
Alias: ann

goto.Name: goto
goto.Content:
Teleport a player to another player (admin-only).
Usage: goto <targetPlayer> <playerToMove>
Notes: Current implementation looks incomplete. It attempts to move <playerToMove> to <targetPlayer>.

/help.Name: /help
/help.Content:
Create a new help entry (admin-only).
Usage: /help create <topic> <category> <content>
Example: /help create look core

/reloadseeddata.Name: /reloadseeddata
/reloadseeddata.Content:
Start the reload-seed-data workflow (admin-only).
Usage: /reloadseeddata
Notes: Prompts for confirmation (type YES) before overwriting with default seed files.

role.Name: role
role.Content:
Change a player role (admin-only).
Usage: role <playerName> <role>
Example roles: Player, Builder, Admin (depends on your enum values)

/shutdown.Name: /shutdown
/shutdown.Content:
Shut down the server safely (admin-only).
Usage: /shutdown
Notes: Broadcasts a warning and saves data before stopping the server.

summon.Name: summon
summon.Content:
Teleport a target player to you, or to another player (admin-only).
Usage:
  summon <targetPlayerName>
  summon <targetPlayerName> <destinationPlayerName>
Examples:
  summon Alice
  summon Alice Bob

where.Name: where
where.Content:
Show where a player is (admin-only).
Usage: where <playerName>
Output: the target player

who.Name: who
who.Content:
List all online players.
Usage: who
Output: each player name, AFK status (if applicable), and their current room, plus a total count.

/room.Name: /room
/room.Content:
Create and edit rooms (Builder+).
Usage:
  /room show
  /room create

/exit.Name: /exit
/exit.Content:
Create and edit exits (Admin-only in current code).
Usage:
  /exit show
  /exit create <name> <description> <direction> <exitDescription>
  /exit set <exitId> <property> <value>
Properties supported by the current code path:
  description, name, icon
Notes: Parts of the current implementation appear to be copied from /room and may still be in-progress.

consider.Name: consider
consider.Content:
Inspect a target during combat.
Usage: consider <targetName>
Result: prints details about the target (based on your combat system implementation).

combatstatus.Name: combatstatus
combatstatus.Content:
Show current combat status.
Usage: combatstatus
Result: prints combat state/details to the player.

attack.Name: attack
attack.Content:
Attack a target and/or start combat.
Usage: attack <targetName>
Aliases: /attack

/soc.Name: /soc
/soc.Content:
Social command (currently prints your IP address).
Usage: /soc
Notes: Likely a placeholder for future social features.

afk.Name: afk
afk.Content:
Toggle AFK status.
Usage: afk
Notes: Marks you as AFK or returns you from AFK (based on your AFK flag).

ip.Name: ip
ip.Content:
Show your IP address.
Usage: ip

look.Name: look
look.Content:
Look around your current room.
Usage: look
Aliases: l
Notes: Typically prints room name, description, exits, and visible entities (depending on your Look implementation).

quit.Name: quit
quit.Content:
Log out / exit the game.
Usage: quit
Aliases: exit

say.Name: say
say.Content:
Say something to the room.
Usage: say <message>
Aliases: ",

tell.Name: tell
tell.Content:
Send a private message to another player.
Usage: tell <playerName> <message>
Aliases: msg, whisper

time.Name: time
time.Content:
Show the current in-game time.
Usage: time

status.Name: status
status.Content:
Show server/system status.
Usage: status
Output includes: server start time, thread count, memory usage, online player count, and in-game date.

help.Name: help
help.Content:
View available help topics, or view a specific topic.
Usage:
  help
  help <topic>
Notes: topic matching is case-insensitive.

weather.Name: weather
weather.Content:
Check the current weather in your area.
Usage: weather
Output: current area weather string.

setweather.Name: setweather
setweather.Content:
Set the current weather for your area (admin-only).
Usage: setweather <weatherValue>
Example: setweather Rainy

map.Name: map
map.Content:
Render the local map.
Usage: map
Notes: Uses your current map radius setting.

move.Name: move
move.Content:
Move in a direction.
Usage:
  move <direction>
  <direction>
Directions:
  north (n), east (e), south (s), west (w), up (u), down (d)
Examples:
  move north
  n

/mob.Name: /mob
/mob.Content:
Create and edit mobs in the mob catalog.
Usage:
  /mob create <name>

/ux.Name: /ux
/ux.Content:
Show a menu of UX test commands.
Usage: /ux
Related:
  /uxpanel, /uxcolor, /uxdecoration, /uxtree, /uxbarchart, /uxcanvas

/uxcolor.Name: /uxcolor
/uxcolor.Content:
Show examples of Spectre.Console color markup.
Usage: /uxcolor
Aliases: /uxcolors

/uxdecoration.Name: /uxdecoration
/uxdecoration.Content:
Show examples of Spectre.Console text decorations.
Usage: /uxdecoration
Aliases: /uxdec, /uxdecorations

/uxtree.Name: /uxtree
/uxtree.Content:
Show an example tree UI.
Usage: /uxtree

/uxbarchart.Name: /uxbarchart
/uxbarchart.Content:
Show an example bar chart UI.
Usage: /uxbarchart
Aliases: /uxbar

/uxcanvas.Name: /uxcanvas
/uxcanvas.Content:
Show an example canvas drawing.
Usage: /uxcanvas
